property.name: hadoop.job.history.user.location
property.description: Hadoop 0.17.x comes with a default setting to create user logs inside the output path of the job. This breaks some Hadoop classes, which expect the output to contain only part-XXXXX files. This setting changes the output to a subdirectory of the regular log directory.

property.name: gate.annotationset.input
property.description: Map the information at the behemoth format onto the select annotationset

property.name: gate.annotationset.output
property.description: AnnotationSet to consider when serializing to the behemoth format

property.name: gate.annotations.filter
property.description: Annotations types to consider when serializing to the behemoth format, separated by commas

property.name: gate.features.filter
property.description: if specified, only the feature listed for a type will be kept

property.name: gate.emptyannotationset
property.description: if specified all the annotations in the Behemoth document will be deleted before processing with GATE

property.name: uima.store.short.names
property.description: The annotations filters must use the full names. This option determines whether we want to keep only the sort version of the types in the Behemoth document. Note that the feature names are always the short ones

property.name: uima.annotations.filter
property.description: Annotations types to consider when serializing to the behemoth format, separated by commas

property.name: uima.features.filter
property.description: if specified, only the feature listed for a type will be kept

property.name: uima.language
property.description: set the language of the cas if not obtained from upstream
